what is an application set well
unlike an argo cd application resource
that deploys resources from a single get
repository to a single cluster or
namespace the application set expands
this functionality an application set
uses a template automation to create
modify and manage multiple argo cd
applications at once while also
targeting multiple clusters and name
spaces
the application set controller is now
installed alongside with argo cd within
the same name space and it creates
